name: Skillgarden - Education Design Template
description:
Hi all. We created a unique website design for the educational platform, we were guided by the fact that each project needs its own unique design, for this we created a lot of options for the main and internal pages, you can go look. This project also contains an admin panel for both students and teachers. You can use individual elements from this template to create your own cool and unique design. We hope you enjoy.

Advantages

  • 10 main pages
  • Over 100 internal pages
  • Admin Panel and Dashboard Pages
  • Components and auto-layout are used
  • Local styles for all pages
  • Separately created components for master pages
  • Kit design for easy project customization
